channel.title: Illegally parked cars on Chine.eu
channel.description: Recent content in Illegally parked cars on Chine.eu

item.title: 2021年01月09日 mentally disturbed woman
item.description: 2021年01月09日。 I politely and respectfully explained a woman that her car was badly parked. She would end up harassing me. I believe she could be charged with witness tampering, and picking quarrels and provoking trouble (寻衅滋事). The Procuratorate should check if some sort of reckless endangerment could apply in China. To know more about the concept of reckless
